about_the_game:
Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique roguelike based on a minesweeper!



Story campaign
The game is filled with a small plot that will make you think. The main character is a lost dwarf who miraculously ended up in a dungeon. There is a portal near you that needs to be repaired. This is only possible if you collect all 4 relics! You need to complete tasks, learn all the mysteries of the dungeon, upgrade your character, interact with factions and defeat the final boss! It won't be easy, but you will prove that it is possible.


An important feature of the game
The game is an adventure in which a unique dungeon is generated every time! During the game you need to extract various resources: iron, gold, rubies. The map is completely destructible, and just by extracting resources you will be playing minesweeper! This project is unique, because the minesweeper game is the main mechanics of the game, while it remains a game in the roguelike genre. But besides bombs, enemies and traps can interfere with you!


Endless Mode
In addition to the story campaign, the game has an endless mode where you will not be disturbed by enemies and tasks. Make yourself comfortable and spend the evening in peace! The game has a leaderboard system, so the whole world will see your result. Can you set a new record?



Waiting for you:
  • Unique game mechanics
  • The most unusual minesweeper game in the world!
  • Generation of unique dungeons
  • Factions of goblins and knights, lots of enemies and traps.
  • Hardcore mode. In this mode, you only have one save! Every exit from the game means that the game will be saved. If you lose, you will have to start over. A mode for real professionals.
  • Classic mode. You can save and load as usual. Become a master!
  • The ability system. During the game, you will unlock various magical abilities that will make you stronger and can change the whole game!
  • The system of character traits. Depending on your actions, the character will receive various bonuses and traits that can change the course of the game.
  • 26 unique achievements (their number will only grow)
  • 8 pleasant soundtracks that will periodically delight you.
  • 19 languages of translation. We are trying to support languages that are not widely spoken, so there will be more of them!
  • Communication with the community. The game was developed by one person, so I will keep in touch with the players in the community. Together we will make the game better!
  • Fun!
detailed_description:
Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique roguelike based on a minesweeper!



Story campaign
The game is filled with a small plot that will make you think. The main character is a lost dwarf who miraculously ended up in a dungeon. There is a portal near you that needs to be repaired. This is only possible if you collect all 4 relics! You need to complete tasks, learn all the mysteries of the dungeon, upgrade your character, interact with factions and defeat the final boss! It won't be easy, but you will prove that it is possible.


An important feature of the game
The game is an adventure in which a unique dungeon is generated every time! During the game you need to extract various resources: iron, gold, rubies. The map is completely destructible, and just by extracting resources you will be playing minesweeper! This project is unique, because the minesweeper game is the main mechanics of the game, while it remains a game in the roguelike genre. But besides bombs, enemies and traps can interfere with you!

  • Hardcore mode. In this mode, you only have one save! Every exit from the game means that the game will be saved. If you lose, you will have to start over. A mode for real professionals.
  • Classic mode. You can save and load as usual. Become a master!
  • The ability system. During the game, you will unlock various magical abilities that will make you stronger and can change the whole game!
  • The system of character traits. Depending on your actions, the character will receive various bonuses and traits that can change the course of the game.
  • 26 unique achievements (their number will only grow)

  • Communication with the community. The game was developed by one person, so I will keep in touch with the players in the community. Together we will make the game better!
  • Fun!
name: Dungeon Minesweeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any with 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1 GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any with 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 2 GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Dungeon Minesweeper is a unique adventure game, with elements of roguelike and minesweeper! Find out all the secrets of the dungeon, upgrade your character, fight factions and defeat the boss!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Belarusian, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Swedish, Lithuanian, Croatian, Malay, Ukrainian, Greek, Czech, Simplified Chinese
